text: Richard "Richie" Havens (January 21, 1941 - April 22, 2013) or Richard P. Havens; was an American folk singer and guitarist who performed at Woodstock 1969. He also performed cover versions of famous popular songs. Havens was born on January 21, 1941 in Brooklyn, New York City. He died due to a heart attack in Jersey City, New Jersey, April 22, 2013 at 72. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:African-American musicians Category:American activists Category:American folk musicians Category:American guitarists Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Folk singers Category:Musicians from Brooklyn Category:Singer-songwriters from New York (state) Category:1941 births Category:2013 deaths
title: Richie Havens
